Champollion, the parrot of the famous archeologist, Sir Arthur Bones, calls upon Clever when his master is abducted by a humanoid robot after localising the famous Templars' treasure.

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam is desperate to join an Endangered Species Protection Association and asks the Scepter for the power to be really funny, so she can win the jury's attention during her online interview. But, the half power gives her a clown's appearance! A silly costume that's impossible to take off! When she goes to look for Mo, Sam is snapped up by Mr. Brick - who, it so happens, used to be a professional clown himself!

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Mo is given endless hours of detention and he's in despair: will he ever have a free Wednesday afternoon again? Amber explains that he can cancel detention hours by doing good deeds for the school. But given his amount of detention, he'll have to perform civic actions that no one has ever managed to complete. To achieve all these tasks, Mo asks the Scepter to grant him ALL super powers

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: Scooby and Shaggy meet up with their biker buddy, Axl Rose, on a tour of famous roadside diners along iconic Route 66.

programme.title: ITV News
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Katie Piper's Breakfast Show
programme.desc: Radio and TV presenter Dev Griffin joins Katie on the show, while there os advice from experts and tips for entertainment in the week ahead

programme.title: Love Your Weekend with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Actress Joanna David chats to Alan at Manor Farm about her time on Celebrity Gogglebox, while floral designer Simon Lycett shows off an autumn bouquet. Plus, the rare-breed sheep leading the way in British fine wool, and a look at the best in British craft beer

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team reveal how adding water can transform any size garden, creating two incredible water gardens, one outside and one inside. In Kent, Alan, Frances Tophill and David Domoney build a stunning outdoor space in a small plot featuring three different but equally spectacular water features. Meanwhile, Katie Rushworth reveals how to build an indoor water feature that can transform a bare corner of a home

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars
programme.desc: Emma Willis and Tom Allen return to host the celebrity cookery competition, as eight stars and their chef mentors compete in culinary cook-offs. The famous faces taking part are Bafta-winning actor Jason Watkins, former boxer Chris Eubank, Gavin & Stacey star Joanna Page, Coronation Street's Samia Longchambon, singer and TV personality Peter Andre, Busted's Matt Willis, Steps' Claire Richards and Love Island star Indiyah Polack

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: The Masked Singer US
programme.desc: In the first of two-part season finale, the winners of Group A and Group B perform festive songs Holly Jolly Christmas and Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas

programme.title: You've Been Framed!
programme.desc: Harry Hill narrates another comical selection of mishaps sent in by viewers, featuring accidents filmed using the latest technology only - no camcorder clips or pixelated phone videos in sight. Featuring a man being accidentally Tasered, a couple setting their kitchen on fire, and a toddler in an electric car running amok in a shopping centre

programme.title: For Your Eyes Only (1981)
programme.desc: James Bond goes in search of a British weapons system aboard a sunken vessel before it falls into the hands of enemies who will use it to deactivate all Western submarines. Unfortunately, his mission is hindered by a crossbow-toting woman out to avenge her father's murder. Spy thriller, starring Roger Moore, Topol, Julian Glover, Carole Bouquet, Jill Bennett and Lynn-Holly Johnson

programme.title: The Chase Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh host with the quiz, as Catherine Tyldesley, Levi Roots, Chris McCausland and Rick Wakeman pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They must work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: Headlines affecting the local area

programme.title: Sitting on a Fortune
programme.desc: Game show hosted by Gary Lineker, with contestants Jesse, Craig, Marie, Sharon, Ian, Chloe and Ali answering questions to remain in with a chance of taking away up to £100,000. Players position themselves in a row of seats one behind another, with one wrong answer seeing them relegated to the back of the line and in real danger of leaving with nothing

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.desc: Stephen Fry presents a documentary looking at the impact of the seasons on wildlife, with first edition examining winter in the northern hemisphere and summer in the southern. On Norwegian archipelago Svalbard's frozen sea-ice, a polar bear mother prepares her cub for a life alone, while Marion Island in the Indian Ocean between South Africa and Antarctica becomes home to a million penguins as breeding season starts

programme.title: A Spy Among Friends
programme.desc: After Soviet double agent Kim Philby defects to the USSR in 1963, his friend and former MI6 colleague Nicholas Elliott comes under investigation by Lily Thomas from MI5. She tries to determine if he facilitated Philby's escape because he is also a traitor working for the Russians, or is it just that his judgement was clouded at a critical moment by their 23-year friendship? Fact-based thriller based on the book by Ben Macintyre, starring Damian Lewis, Guy Pearce and Anna Maxwell Martin

programme.title: ITV News and Weather
programme.desc: Round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure
programme.desc: The actress heads off on a journey to visits important places in the spice trade, beginning by travelling to a collection of remote Indonesian islands so small that her first challenge is finding them on a map. She meets a family on the Banda Islands making their living from harvesting nutmeg, uncovers the dark history of Banda's past and discovers that its charms once attracted A-list celebrities, including Mick Jagger

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell tell more stories of people desperate to find missing family and answer questions that have haunted entire lives, beginning with two men searching for the truth about their beginnings. Paul Connolly had a brutal childhood and was put out with the rubbish as a baby in east London and raised in care, while Shaun Lawrence had a happy adoption with wonderful parents but was always curious about his birth parents

programme.title: Monster Carp
programme.desc: Neil Spooner and Tom Dove head to Croatia to fish at Lake Zajarki on the outskirts of Zagreb, with the chance of catching a carp in excess of 90lb

programme.title: Tour de France Highlights
programme.desc: Action from stage nine, featuring a route of 182.5km from Saint-Leonard-de-Noblat to Puy de Dome. Gary Imlach presents, with analysis from Peter Kennaugh and Marcel Kittel, reports by Daniel Friebe and Matthew Rendell, and commentary from Ned Boulting and David Millar

programme.title: Catchphrase
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts the game show, asking three contestants to 'see it and say it' as they try to guess the familiar phrases hidden in animated clues. After the first elimination, the two remaining players battle to reach the Super Catchphrase round, where one of them could win £50,000

programme.title: The Masked Singer US
programme.desc: The American version of the show in which mystery celebrities battle it out in a singing contest while dressed head to toe in elaborate costumes

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents action from Snetterton, featuring the Hagerty Radical Cup UK and the Porsche Sprint Challenge GB

programme.desc: Daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection

programme.title: James Martin's French Adventure
programme.desc: The celebrated chef journeys through France, retracing the memorable TV trip his food hero Keith Floyd took 30 years ago, while also visiting the places that carved his culinary beginnings

programme.desc: Morning magazine featuring a lively mix of news and current affairs, plus health, entertainment and lifestyle features

programme.desc: Entertainment, current affairs and fashion news, as well as showbiz stories and celebrity gossip. Presented by Lorraine Kelly

programme.desc: Celebrity interviews and studio discussion from a female perspective

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The key headlines from the day so far

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: Headlines affecting the local area

programme.title: James Martin's French Adventure
programme.desc: The chef heads to the house of the founding father of Impressionism, Claude Monet, in Giverny, where he wastes no time in walking over the famous Japanese bridge to gaze at the water lillies. With his tour of the iconic garden complete, James sets up his mobile kitchen to cook a dish of crab and dulse, inspired by Monet's need to provide large meals for the brood of eight children he had with his second wife. He also takes a peek inside Monet's kitchen, and samples a pike dish served up by local chef Eric Guerin. A trip to a nearby orchard affords James the chance to prepare apple doughnuts, before he returns hope to cook Normandy tart - a local pudding - and an inventive omelette

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Adil Ray hosts as three pairs of contestants call upon their powers of deduction in a battle of words, with the last remaining duo given the chance to double their winnings or leave with nothing. Playing today are married couple Jon and Nicola, student housemates Caitlin and Emily, and bookmaker's manager Vicky and her partner Andy

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. Dropping tokens down a choice of four chutes, they hope to knock piles of them off a moving shelf - and the more they collect, the greater the prize fund. The player who has won the least amount is then eliminated, and the last one standing competes for a £10,000 jackpot

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents as contestants Ellen, Kevin, Josh and Neha, who have never met before, pit their wits against one of the ruthless Chasers in the hope of winning a potential prize pot worth thousands of pounds. They work as a team and play strategically to answer general knowledge questions against the clock and race down the game board to the exit without being caught

programme.title: ITV News London
programme.desc: Headlines affecting the local area

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: A round-up of the day's news headlines and talking points from the UK and around the world

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Charity ignores Marlon's pleas and Dan is taken for further questioning. Dawn and Billy have an emotional moment

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Adam fears that he has blood on his hands and Gemma faces the music with social services. Spider's boss offers him a new assignment and Stephen resents Elaine's new friend Gerry

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell meet Sara Hathaway who, after losing her adoptive mother and older brother in the space of just a year, is desperate to find her birth family. Plus, Diane Kerridge shares her story of being forced to give up the child she gave birth to as a teenager in the 1960s. Over 50 years later, she is hoping to find her long lost son

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
programme.desc: A fresh perspective on the major stories of the day, featuring national and international news, with reports and analysis from ITV's correspondents

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen (2007)
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Don Cheadle and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Tour de France Highlights
programme.desc: Gary Imlach looks back at the opening week of racing so far, as the riders recover on the first rest day in Clermont Ferrand. With analysis from Peter Kennaugh and Ellen van Dijk, reports by Daniel Friebe and Matthew Rendell, and commentary from Ned Boulting and David Millar

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Adll Ray hosts as husband and wife Tony and Caroline from Bromley, south London, San Francisco-born Eric and his husband Russell, and childhood sweethearts Ruka and Ibrahim from Peckham, south London, use their powers of deduction to work out words that appear in the Lingo grids and Puzzlewords. The last remaining duo have the opportunity to win the money they've banked earlier in the show to potentially double their winnings, or leaving with nothing

programme.title: Cooking with the Stars

programme.title: Ellie Simmonds: Finding My Secret Family
programme.desc: Gold-winning Paralympian swimmer Ellie Simmonds won the nation's hearts when she took part in Strictly Come Dancing, the first person with dwarfism to compete on the show. Ten days after she was born, Ellie was placed for adoption, and has often wondered if this decision was taken after her parents were told she had a disability. Now she wants to find her birth mother, and gain a wider understanding about why children from diverse backgrounds are more likely to be placed for adoption

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Keen to prove that he is hard-working to Queen Libby and his parents, Lloyd volunteers to work in the ant colony for a day, swapping with ant Annie 209 to replace him at home. However, things don't go to plan, and Lloyd creates chaos in the colony...

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Lloyd tries to educate PB about the danger of spiders by luring one out with a decoy fly - his clumsy attempts attract a curious spider called Julie, who PB immediately wants to befriend. programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: The Ropers suffer a domestic crisis when Mildred discovers George has been writing to another woman. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The murder of a retired university fellow leads to a complex investigation for Morse and Lewis as they piece together a story of student suicide, drugs and the mysterious dismissal of a loyal college scout. John Thaw and Kevin Whately star, with Phyllis Logan, Gabrielle Lloyd, Amanda Ryan and Tony Haygarth

programme.title: Carry On Loving (1970)
programme.desc: A couple who run a dating agency find themselves inundated with customers, and end up arranging a selection of very unlikely matches - while also contending with their own marital difficulties. Comedy, starring Sid James, Hattie Jacques, Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Bernard Bresslaw, Joan Sims and Terry Scott

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Al welcomes his first fishing guests, but an uninvited one means that a good review is definitely not guaranteed, while Bert decides to try to rejuvenate trade at the restaurant by joining an online voucher scheme. Morwenna asks Martin for a pay rise, and Louisa has to find a new babysitter to look after James Henry and reluctantly decides to offer Janice a trial. Penhale is excited to receive his new police issue Taser, but Portwenn does not exactly offer him plenty of opportunities to try it out. Comedy drama, starring Martin Clunes

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: Lady Virginia Revel receives a marriage proposal from an ambitious politician, but is reluctant to accept it, especially as she is also being courted by a dashing young suitor. Accompanied by Miss Marple, she travels to a weekend party at her family home Chimneys, hoping to reach a decision. Negotiations for the sale of the country house are taking place during the gathering, but when new owner Count Ludwig of Austria is found murdered, St Mary Mead's elderly spinster must identify the culprit. Whodunit, starring Julia McKenzie, with a supporting cast including Gavin & Stacey stars Ruth Jones and Mathew Horne, plus Dervla Kirwan, Charlotte Salt, Michelle Collins, Jonas Armstrong and Edward Fox

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The dapper detective accepts an invitation to spend yuletide at the house of an elderly millionaire who seems intent on provoking his money-grubbing sons into murdering him. At first he tries hard to ignore the strained atmosphere and relax - but soon finds himself with a gruesome mystery on his hands. Agatha Christie whodunit, starring David Suchet and Philip Jackson

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: When a spate of petty thefts culminates in a series of murders at a student hostel, Miss Lemon persuades the Belgian sleuth to investigate. As ever, he receives support from Chief Inspector Japp. Mystery, starring David Suchet, with Philip Jackson, Pauline Moran, Damian Lewis and Paris Jefferson

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The amateur sleuths are hired to bring a mansion's walled garden back to life, with help from inmates of the local prison. Events take a sinister turn when the owner's cousin is found drowned in the local fast-flowing river - and become even more mysterious when, just before the inquest, Rosemary sees the dead man alive. Feature-length edition of the mystery drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Ma is worried that Pop is working too hard and books a weekend in Margate, with Charley and Mariette left to mind the kids and sort out the new TV aerial, which is being delivered by the wily Wilf. Meanwhile, Tom Fisher makes his move and asks Mariette on a date, much to Charley's chagrin

programme.title: The Savoy
programme.desc: Cameras follow hotel guests as they look to celebrate special occasions after the pandemic lockdowns, and the pressure is on hotel staff to meet their high expectations. Sean puts some of the newer members of his butler team through their paces, and in the Thames Foyer, Enzo is pulling out all the stops to deliver the perfect afternoon tea

programme.title: Foyle's War
programme.desc: Michael Kitchen returns to the role of Christopher Foyle, senior intelligence officer for MI5, in the first of three films. Foyle is drawn into the world of corrupt Nazi businessmen when a university professor is found murdered in a London park. When it transpires the victim was working as a translator in Nuremberg, the detective realises there are powerful people trying to conceal secrets from the Second World War. Meanwhile, Sam (Honeysuckle Weeks) volunteers for a risky undercover job, despite being pregnant. Guest stars include John Mahoney (Frasier), Jaime Winstone (Mad Dogs) and Nigel Lindsay (Four Lions)

programme.title: Upstairs, Downstairs
programme.desc: The family gathers to celebrate Lady Marjorie's birthday, and as James returns to England with his fiancee, Phyllis, Elizabeth learns the unpleasant truth about her Armenian lover Julius

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: A routine visit turns into a nightmare for Jill when she is taken hostage by a psychologically damaged ex-prisoner of war, who has barricaded himself into his house and booby-trapped the surrounding land with mines. Meanwhile, Harper is spotted paying frequent visits to a woman in town and Alun is suspended from duty when his noisy band practice causes a woman to slip and break her hip. Medical drama, starring Robert Daws, Amy Robbins, Wendy Craig, Ian Carmichael, Michael Starke, John Axon and Andy Wear

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Dr Weatherill is involved in an air rescue to save an unconscious girl and finds herself braving a cliff abseil to reach the youngster. Dr Ormerod faces a difficult time when he misdiagnoses a patient who is left fighting for life in hospital. Sister Brigid has an accident on her bike, while Harper faces a staff revolt. Medical drama, starring Amy Robbins, Robert Daws, Linda Armstrong and John Axon

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The Oxford detective is given a book on Victorian crimes while languishing in hospital, and soon becomes obsessed with a murder committed in 1859. Convinced the three men hanged for the crime were innocent, he sets out to solve the long-forgotten case. Starring John Thaw, Lisa Eichhorn, Judy Loe, Matthew Finney, James Grout and Clare Holman

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Cash-strapped George knows exactly what he can sell to raise money - but decides not to tell Mildred. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: At Charity's trial, Cain shocks the court by proclaiming his cousin's innocence - earning himself 30 days in jail. Bernice enlists Marlon's help with the Woolpack, and Terry and Dawn reaffirm their love

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Scott's testimony is demolished, leaving Zoe at the mercy of Charity, who is determined to manipulate the situation to her advantage. Bernice and Ashley spend time together - much to Louise's chagrin

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Joe takes the factory girls out to celebrate the new deal, but an argument prompts Janice and her cronies to leave Karen and the boss alone - putting Steve's nose out of joint in the process. Katy collapses in the Rovers and Tracy is furious with Peter for not coming clean to Shelley

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Katy is rushed to hospital, where her parents receive a surprising diagnosis, while Joe finally makes a move on Karen - only to get an unexpected response

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Mildred faces the prospect of becoming a step-grandmother when George's past catches up with him. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Mrs Roper wants to install a shower, but a lack of cash forces a compromise on costs - and workmanship. Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce star

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: New recruit Thelma Parker catches the eye of Harper, but proves to be less popular with the rest of the team, and an injured boxer causes concern for the staff at the hospital. Medical drama starring John Axon, Amy Robbins, Anna Madeley and Barbara Marten

programme.desc: Samantha struggles to cope with the reality of her recent discovery and takes desperate action which leaves her life hanging in the balance as Nurse Taylor races to reach her. Frankie and Gordon attempt a daring rescue to help a teenager in danger on the weir, while Ken has something to hide from Harper. Rural hospital drama starring Anna Madeley, Scott Taylor and Robert Daws

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A serious road accident causes chaos for the residents of Aidensfield when a tanker containing a mysterious substance is breached, leaving a reservoir polluted and Ashfordly police tearing their hair out as they try to track down the culprit. Luckily, the staff of nearby St Aidan's Royal Free hospital are on hand to offer some much-needed assistance

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jenny's younger brother Steve pays a visit, and soon begins to threaten her relationship with Merton. Meanwhile, David sets his sights on joining a mod gang causing havoc in the village. Sarah Tansey, Thom Fell, Maureen O'Brien and Robert East star

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Charity hears Zoe stick to her guns in the courtroom, firmly insisting Chris was killed by his wife. Meanwhile, Louise and Ashley reach the end of the road

programme.title: Classic Emmerdale
programme.desc: Charity takes the stand, sticking to her statement despite the prosecution's best efforts. The jury quickly reach a verdict and all eyes are on the accused as she hears her fate

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Steve storms round to the factory to have it out with Joe, and the Nelsons are relieved when Katy regains consciousness, although she is confused about her illness

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Peter is torn when Shelley tells him her sister's funeral is on Monday, the same day he is getting married to Lucy

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The detective investigates when a victim of fraud is found murdered on a golf course - but his inquiries are complicated by the discovery of a tramp's mutilated body nearby. To make matters worse, beautiful singer Bella Duveen is also around, seemingly intent on helping herself to a grim souvenir. David Suchet stars, with Hugh Fraser, Bill Moody and Jacinta Mulcahy

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Ventress thinks Mike's replacement PC Steve Crane is too anxious to prove his worth as he investigates a spate of farm break-ins on the moors, and Vernon causes chaos trying to impress new arrival Dr Liz Merrick with his community spirit. Elsewhere, Mike grows disillusioned with CID work. James Carlton and Aislin McGuckin star as the newcomers

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: An informant reveals two local hoodlums are planning to raid a shipment of gold bullion from Haworth Point, prompting Shiner to set up an ambush to catch the would-be thieves. Gina receives a visit from her niece, who has fallen in with a bad crowd back in Manchester, while Liz enlists David to paint the surgery and sitting room - but is less than pleased with the results. Drama, starring Simon Molloy and Tricia Penrose

programme.title: Endeavour
programme.desc: The young detective is suspended from duty following a recent case. However, he is roused from his bitterness and self-pity when the body of a woman who went missing at a funfair on Cowley Green is found near his home. He resolves to conduct a secret investigation of his own, which leads him to the city's social elite and a disturbing secret hidden in plain sight. Shaun Evans stars as the young Inspector Morse in the third series of the detective drama

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: While investigating the murder of prison officer Charlie Tyner, Brooks and Devlin discover he had been abusing his position and convicts in his charge. A suspect is brought to trial, but Steel and Phillips go in pursuit of a career criminal connected to Tyner and have to persuade their key witness to give evidence against a man she claims to love. Starring Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber, Ben Daniels and Freema Agyeman

She must get under the skin of a grieving and complicated family if she has any chance of solving the case, as well as navigating her blended family, who are struggling to settle in their new environment

programme.desc: The sleuth heads to Lake Windermere for a holiday with faithful assistant Hastings, only to find his crime-solving skills are once again needed to investigate a murder. The only witness to the crime is a dog, leaving Poirot with a difficult task to find the killer. David Suchet stars, with Kate Buffery, Patrick Ryecart and Julia St John

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A clairvoyant at Whitby Funfair gives a bride-to-be cold feet about her imminent nuptials. Rural drama, starring Ruth Platt, Robert Hands, Mark Jordan and Craig Heaney

programme.desc: Liz's past catches up with her, and Vernon's dreams of wealth go up in smoke. Meanwhile, Merton receives crime-fighting assistance from an unlikely source - two locals dressed as Batman and Robin, who have spotted criminal activity on a derelict farm

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: As darkness covers Midsomer Stanton during a total eclipse of the sun, Jeremy Harper is killed by a blow to the head with a meteorite. The victim was a leading light in the village - an amateur astronomer who was passionate about preserving Moonstone Ridge, a Bronze Age heritage site housing a 1930s observatory. Barnaby and Jones are called in to investigate, and the duo discover that intrigue, sexual tension and academic rivalry are rife among the local stargazing community. Murder mystery, guest starring Maureen Lipman and Kenny Ireland, with Neil Dudgeon and Jason Hughes

programme.title: Law & Order: UK
programme.desc: The withdrawal of a library book on the day of his death is the only clue to a student's murder. Two people who can be linked to the book give each other an alibi, and the police have their work cut out to identify who is lying. The killer eventually confesses and claims self-defence, forcing Phillips to face up to past demons, while Steel finds himself not only prosecuting the offender but also defending the victim. Freema Agyeman and Ben Daniels star

programme.title: James Martin's French Adventure
programme.desc: The chef arrives in the riverside town of L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue in south-eastern France, where his culinary hero Keith Floyd once owned a restaurant. Buying produce from its floating market, and a Floyd-style hat, James sets up his mobile kitchen on a bridge overlooking the river, and cooks peaches pain perdu in the sunshine. Heading back in the direction of the town, James samples some truffle-laden dishes at renowned restaurant La Beaugraviere

programme.title: James Martin's French Adventure
programme.desc: This time, the chef visits the capital city, Paris, exploring one of the largest wholesale food markets in Europe, before setting up a cooking station in one of the warehouses to cook a dish using chicken and mushrooms. James also visits the kitchen of the world-renowned chef, Pierre Gagnaire

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: Chef Gino D'Acampo tours his homeland by train, taking in some of some of the most scenic train journeys in Europe. He begins in the French Alpine town of Breil-sur-Roya, so he can travel into Italy in style. Once in his own country, he meets a doctor who does his rounds on horseback, and visits hazelnut groves where he prepares a chocolate cheesecake. In Turin, he fulfils a lifelong dream of racing on top of the world-famous Lingotto rooftop track and makes his final dish - fettuccine pasta with mascarpone and pork mince

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: For the next leg of his journey, Gino D'Acampo boards an old steam train run by ex-railroad men and volunteers which takes him through the beautiful Tuscan countryside. His first stop is the town of Asciano, where locals try to compete with Siena's famous Palio horse race - only here they ride donkeys. Then it's on to the Chianti region where he visits a vineyard where they don't only make wine, but they also bathe in it too, an ancient tradition dating back to Roman times. After a luxurious wine bath, Gino cooks up a dish fit for any Emperor - farfalle pasta with funghi and spinach

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping (1995)

programme.title: Untold: Konan - Trapped in Trauma
programme.desc: Konan, one half of award-winning rap duo Krept and Konan, confronts his trauma and guilt for the first time since witnessing his stepfather's murder as he shines light on what experts describe as a crisis in youth mental health across the UK. He meets some of the estimated 300,000 young people suffering from PTSD and learns how a lack of understanding and how difficult it can be to get treatment is contributing to the mounting crisis

programme.desc: The chief yeoman warder oversees the tower's celebration of the end of the First World War, and special preparations are made for the tower director's retirement party, involving a military band and a unique farewell as he leaves the tower for the last time. programme.title: Inside the Tower of London
programme.desc: The new tower director starts work on the same day that Donald Trump visits London, while curator Eleri Lynn goes in search of a recently rediscovered royal treasure - the last surviving dress made for Elizabeth I, which has turned up in a small village church in Herefordshire. programme.desc: Rob Bell tells the dramatic story of the Second World War aircraft carrier, which hunted down some of Nazi Germany's most feared warships

programme.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink
programme.desc: Three lads hit a Greek tattoo studio after a heavy night's drinking, only for one of them to wake up the next day with a 'burger nipple'. Another holiday-maker loses a bet which means he has to get a picture of his friends etched on his backside, and a Manchester bloke waltzes out of a tattoo studio with a pair of lips inked onto his bum

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Anne Maurice offers advice to the owner of a Brixton flat, on the market for £235,000, to make it more attractive to prospective buyers

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey's Amazing Adventures
programme.desc: The inquisitive puppet investigates shadows and visits the Met Office, where he is shown how to record the sunshine

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: When Roger's refrigerated van gets stuck in a ditch, the pups must find a way to keep the ice pops cold while they rescue the van and restart the freezer

programme.title: Zulu (1964)
programme.desc: An upper-class soldier and his fellow officer stationed at Rorke's Drift in 1879 discover they have been cut off after the destruction of the main British army column in the area. They must rally their small force of 140 men against the might of 4,000 Zulu warriors advancing on their position. Fact-based historical drama, starring Michael Caine, Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, Nigel Green and Chief Buthelezi, with narration by Richard Burton

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part 1 Interview Special
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Simon Pegg and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about the spectacular seventh film in the action-adventure series

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul (2017)
programme.desc: Youngster Greg Heffley hatches a plot to re-route a family road trip towards a videogame convention. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Drucker, Alicia Silverstone and Tom Everett Scott

programme.title: Stardust (2007)
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2 (2000)
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt sent to find and destroy the only sample of a deadly man-made virus. However, he faces tough opposition in a former spy-turned-criminal mastermind who has already acquired the cure and now wants the pathogen itself. Director John Woo's action thriller sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton and Anthony Hopkins

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard (2017)
programme.desc: A disgraced bodyguard is hired to protect a hitman about to testify against the tyrannical president of Belarus at the International Criminal Court in exchange for the release of his wife from prison. Comedy action thriller, starring Ryan Reynolds, Samuel L Jackson, Gary Oldman and Salma Hayek

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key (2018)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist returns to her family home to investigate supernatural disturbances. Fourth instalment in the horror saga, starring Lin Shaye, Angus Sampson, Leigh Whannell and Spencer Locke

programme.title: Corpus Christi (2019)
programme.desc: When a 20-year-old criminal experiences a spiritual transformation after his release from prison, he decides to minister a small-town parish, which also offers an opportunity for the local community to begin the healing process after a tragedy that happened there. Drama, starring Bartosz Bielenia, Aleksandra Konieczna and Eliza Rycembel. In Polish

programme.title: My Man Godfrey (1936)
programme.desc: A spoiled aristocratic woman hires a tramp as her butler, little anticipating how valuable he will prove _ or what effect his charms will have on her. Classic comedy, starring William Powell, Carole Lombard and Alice Brady

programme.title: Fire Down Below (1957)
programme.desc: Felix and Tony run a tramp steamer together in the West Indies, but their seemingly unshakeable friendship is tossed aside when they both fall in love with the same woman. Tony tries to undermine his rival by exposing his illegal activities, while Felix responds with deadly intent. Romantic drama, with Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon

programme.title: Hatari! (1962)
programme.desc: A group of reckless animal trappers travels through the wilds of Africa, but the arrival of a beautiful photographer looks set to cause upheaval among the group. Comedy adventure, starring John Wayne, Red Buttons, Hardy Kruger, Elsa Martinelli and Michele Girardon

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra (2009)
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part 1 Interview Special
programme.desc: Tom Cruise, Hayley Atwell, Simon Pegg and director Christopher McQuarrie talk about the spectacular seventh film in the action-adventure series

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)
programme.desc: Four teenagers play a jungle-themed game on an old console, only to find themselves transported into the game and transformed into its heroic characters. They must embark on a death-defying journey through the game's wilderness setting to make it back to the real world, or be stuck as video game characters forever. Fantasy action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black

programme.title: This Is England (2006)
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Shaun lives with his mother in a shabby council flat in a bleak northern town and is lacking direction after losing his father in the Falklands War. At school, he is befriended by a skinhead gang and the leader takes the boy under his wing - a tie that draws Shaun into a world of racism and violence, but one where he begins to find a new identity. Shane Meadows' drama set in the 1980s, starring Thomas Turgoose, Stephen Graham and Jo Hartley

programme.title: T2 Trainspotting (2017)
programme.desc: Recovering heroin addict Mark Renton returns to his Edinburgh roots after 20 years living overseas, hoping to make peace with the friends he abandoned. However, starting anew proves far from easy, especially when old partner in crime Begbie escapes from prison, still brooding on Renton's betrayal. Danny Boyle's drama sequel, starring Ewan McGregor, Robert Carlyle, Ewen Bremner and Jonny Lee Miller

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone (1958)
programme.desc: A drifter rides into a town dominated by the members of a ruthless family. He befriends a Mexican in jail for killing a man who attacked his sister and tries to save him from the gallows, getting caught up in the evil clan's running internal conflicts in the process. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Craig Stevens, Manuel Rojas and Barry Kelley

programme.title: All the King's Men (1949)
programme.desc: A small-town senator wins popular support by railing against the corruption of the political establishment and vowing to defend the interests of ordinary working people. However, once in office, he succumbs to greed as readily as those he once so virulently condemned. Political drama, starring Broderick Crawford, Joanne Dru, John Ireland and Mercedes McCambridge

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared (1959)
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (1957)
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villain's cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana

programme.title: Now You See Me 2 (2016)
programme.desc: A gang of magicians-turned-criminals is reunited for a comeback performance by a ruthless technology magnate, whose actual goal is to force the team into carrying out a seemingly impossible heist on his behalf. The illusionists realise their only hope of avoiding the law is to perform one last unprecedented stunt to expose the businessman's illegal activities. Crime thriller sequel, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Daniel Radcliffe and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Hitman (2007)
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III (2006)
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ethan Hunt is called out of retirement when an ex-trainee is taken hostage by a ruthless arms dealer, but when the rescue operation goes wrong, the villain decides to target Hunt's fiancee. Action thriller sequel directed by JJ Abrams, starring Tom Cruise, Philip Seymour Hoffman, Michelle Monaghan, Ving Rhames and Simon Pegg

programme.title: Last Action Hero (1993)
programme.desc: A boy watching an action movie is transported into the film by a magic ticket and meets its hero figure, who refuses to believe he is a fictional character. Matters take a turn for the worse when the screen villain gets hold of the ticket and crosses over into the real world - where bad guys can win. Comedy adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Austin O'Brien, Charles Dance, F Murray Abraham and Anthony Quinn

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Joel keeps a huge secret from Leela, the village comes together to mourn Juliet, DeMarcus receives a surprise phone call ad the teenagers get ready for their prom

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Things are finally working out for Adam, until he receives a letter from NYU that could change everything, while Barry hears that the JTP have other friends outside the crew

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: When Adam takes Beverly to her high-school reunion, he tries to prevent a reality where she winds up with the wrong man

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Fiery chef Gordon Ramsay comes to the aid of a mother-and-son team who have gone through 20 chefs in two years at their struggling Italian restaurant in California. The adjoining bar is a triumph, but the oldest dining establishment in town needs an overhaul if the inexperienced owners are to make a profit

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits some of the restaurants that he set out to save, including the Mixing Bowl, the Olde Stone Mill, Peter's and Campania. Have their owners pulled themselves out of their nightmares?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef again comes to the aid of failing American restaurants, starting in Fishtown, Philadelphia, where he tries to help the three owners of the Hot Potato Cafe, which has not made a profit in two years. Spurred on by a scathing review by an influential critic, he makes radical changes to alter the staff's attitudes and create food that is up to his own exacting standards

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to Flamangos restaurant in Whitehouse, New Jersey, where he tries to help the mother-and-daughter owners turn around their struggling business's fortunes. He faces a struggle because parent Adelle has a bad relationship with her staff and is disappointed by the resident chef, leaving Gordon with the added challenge of changing her attitude

programme.title: Monster House (2006)
programme.desc: A boy becomes obsessed with a sinister elderly neighbour living in a creepy old house. On Halloween night, he and two friends discover the chilling truth - the house is alive and eats anything that comes too close, including children. Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Howard stake their most coveted comic books on a bet over the species of a cricket, while Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first night together. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon succeeds in getting Penny to conform to his high standards, so Leonard adopts a similar strategy for his romantic gain. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj meet two women at a goth nightclub and things appear to go well - until they are taken to a tattoo parlour

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj accepts Sheldon's offer to work for him as he is desperate to avoid being sent back to India. Howard starts spending more time with Leonard and Penny, who would rather be left alone. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is given the chance to square off against the one actor from the Star Trek franchise he holds a grudge against - Wil Wheaton. Meanwhile, Leonard asks Penny to set Howard up on a date with one of her friends. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard worries his lack of American football knowledge is alienating him from Penny and her friends. However, he finds an unlikely sporting tutor in the form of Sheldon, who reluctantly spent most of his childhood attending games with his father. Meanwhile, Raj is infuriated when Howard abandons him to pursue a girl at a kite-fighting contest

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A jealous Leonard argues with Penny when she invites one of her male friends to stay at her apartment while he is in town. Unfortunately, the row brings up unpleasant memories for Sheldon of watching his warring parents, causing even more tension between the friends. Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons star

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond (2016)
programme.desc: The USS Enterprise sets out on a rescue mission which turns out to be a deadly trap set by a mysterious warlord. The crew are left stranded on an unexplored planet, and join forces with a fugitive alien scavenger to find a way off the hostile world and prevent a terrible weapon being unleashed upon the galaxy. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017)
programme.desc: Having saved the world once, secret agents Eggsy and Merlin join forces with their US counterparts to bring down a psychotic femme fatale. Thankfully they are assisted by a veteran hero brought back from the dead, and cross paths with a kidnapped Elton John and a couple of killer robot dogs along the way. Director Matthew Vaughn's comedy adventure sequel, starring Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong and Julianne Moore

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson meets 24-year-old fitness fanatic Rose, whose body has been getting all the attention in the gym while her love life has been neglected. She is bored of being one of the lads and hopes to be seen for all that she is. Next up is Clarissa, a 22-year-old barista from Basingstoke who is looking for her dream woman. Will either of tonight's singletons pick the right date when everything is stripped back to basics?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: Programmes including The Andrew Marr Show, I'm a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here!, The Snowman, First Dates, The Apprentice and The Secret Life of the Zoo come under the armchair critics' gaze as they share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week. The programme captures their instant reactions and lively discussions from the comfort of their own homes. First aired in December 2018

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Fitness fanatic Jade, 24, sits down for a meal with Jak, 29, a yoga lover in touch with his spiritual side and who shares her love of exercise and tattoos, while fashion stylist Christine, 70, and entrepreneur Peter, 71, share stories of the Swinging Sixties. Health club manager Donna, 51, is a born romantic with old fashioned values at heart and her date is 53-year-old stetson-wearing Simon from Dallas, Texas, who's happy to stand out from the crowd and is looking for a strong woman to stand by his side

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire is stuck at an airport and needs to track down Haley, who has gone missing following an argument, so she logs on to her laptop and checks in with the rest of the family in the hope of making amends with her daughter. Julie Bowen stars in a novel episode filmed entirely on Apple devices, with Ty Burrell, Ed O'Neill and Sarah Hyland

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Jay and Claire shoot an advert to rival a competitor's catchy new campaign - but creative differences threaten to tear the father and daughter apart. Phil, Luke and Manny join forces to take down a Peeping Tom who has been using a drone to spy on a sunbathing Gloria, Cam worries about Lily's lack of singing skills ahead of a talent show, and Haley has a confession for Andy when he's rushed to hospital with appendicitis

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Claire prepares the Dunphy household for Halloween, but the rest of the family is less enthusiastic. The spooky goings-on remind Cameron of a traumatic childhood experience, and Gloria is upset when Jay and Manny make fun of her accent

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: While Claire and Haley fall ill at the same time, Phil wages battle against a defective smoke detector after concluding it is saying 'you're not a man' to him. Elsewhere, Manny accidentally gets one of Jay's employees dismissed. Comedy, starring Ty Burrell and Julie Bowen

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard's fear of commitment causes him to avoid Bernadette, but he soon realises he has made a mistake and tries to compensate for it. Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg and Kaley Cuoco star, with an appearance by Katee Sackhoff (Battlestar Galactica) as herself

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny endure an awkward night at the cinema, both insisting the outing is not a date. programme.desc: Leonard's mother visits and he is horrified to learn that Sheldon knows more than he does about his own family, including his parents' impending divorce and the death of his dog. Guest starring Christine Baranski

Dutch pilot Tim is also feeling the love, as a bromance begins to blossom

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on another journey around the nation with a copy of George Bradshaw's Victorian Railway Guidebook to discover how the railways have affected people and what remains of Bradshaw's Britain. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.desc: Richard Ayoade takes actress and writer Jessica Hynes on a whirlwind weekend away to Iceland, a country famous for spectacular water features, geo-thermic pools and a curious belief in elves - all attributes that the pair investigate with ruthless efficiency. They go on the popular Golden Circle Tour of the Nordic island's most famous waterfalls, glaciers and geysers - by helicopter, saving seven valuable hours. They also eat rotten shark and Brenavin, a spirit made from mashed potato, and attend elf school, followed by a speedy boat trip in search of whales. There's also a rapid chill-out at the Blue Lagoon geothermic pool and spa

They then take a hot-air balloon flight over the Atlas Mountains with breathtaking views, watch a traditional story-telling performance and visit the historic Saadian tombs, as well as Marrakech's ancient tanneries. programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Linda is looking for a holiday home in Paphos on the west coast of Cyprus, and has asked her sister Marie to and property expert Scarlette Douglas to join her in her search. But with a budget of £80,000 and a wish list they be able to find a property that ticks all the boxes?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi tries to help Sheffield couple Chris and Lynn Simmerson find their ideal retirement home on Spain's Costa Blanca and discovers their £80,000 budget stretches further than expected

programme.title: Five Star Kitchen: Britain's Next Great Chef
programme.desc: The semi-final finds the four remaining chefs put through their paces in their toughest challenge yet. First, they must present an opulent feasting centrepiece designed to attract groups of diners who are keen to splash the cash on a special occasion. The pressure mounts in the kitchen as the chefs are next challenged to cater an exclusive banquet for 100 VIP guests, with each chef producing one course - starter, fish, meat and dessert - under the watchful eye of global restaurateur Mike Reid

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on the Eurovision Song Contest, Beat the Chasers, The Queen's Platinum Jubilee Celebration, Lovestruck High, The Repair Shop, Drag Me to Hell, and ITV News coverage of the Jubilee pudding

programme.title: Ghislaine Maxwell: The Making of a Monster
programme.desc: Documentary profile of the sex trafficker, being told over three nights, beginning by delving into her lavish childhood in the shadow of a tyrannical father and examining if this affected the woman she was to become. Her father's death left the family penniless and ostracised, but Ghislaine's move to New York in the early 1990s, and association with a mysterious money manager, enabled her to make a new start. But at what price?

programme.title: Ghislaine Maxwell: The Making of a Monster
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the shocking contrast between the incredible wealth and power wielded by Ghislaine Maxwell and her partner Jeffrey Epstein in American high society, and the crimes they were committing behind closed doors. They entertained presidents and princes in fabulous properties and on a private island. But there are those who claim Maxwell enticed them into that world only to feed Epstein's sexual aberrations

programme.title: Ghislaine Maxwell: The Making of a Monster
programme.desc: This instalment of the documentary charts events in the steady demise of Ghislaine Maxwell. The socialite narrowly escaped an initial police investigation into the sexual abuse of dozens of underage girls in Epstein's Florida mansion. However, her subsequent rehabilitation as an environmentalist was scuppered when she went on the offensive against an accuser. Lawyers of survivors explain their innovative strategy that forced Ghislaine into a corner. It initiated a domino effect that eventually led to an ultimate reckoning - at the criminal trial that found her guilty in December 2021

programme.title: Jon Snow: A Witness to History
programme.desc: The newsreader shares his unique experiences and what they've taught him about humanity in the course of his decades-long career as a world-renowned reporter and Channel 4 News anchor. Despite a lifetime reporting on large-scale trauma and bloodshed, Jon remains an eternal optimist, while wondering: can an individual really make a difference in this confusing and complicated world?

programme.title: Extraordinary Escapes with Sandi Toksvig
programme.desc: Sandi is joined by comedian and author Rosie Jones for a journey round the Midlands exploring the best staycation retreats they have to offer. The pair begin in Rutland where they stay at the Rocket Lodge, an eco-build made of upcycled grain silos that boasts a wood-fired hot-tub, a circular kitchen and a disco bathroom. In the sand dunes on a strip of the Lincolnshire coastline, the duo stay in a rebooted 70s beach house called Sandy Feet where Sandi learns that 'Netflix and chill' doesn't mean what she thinks it does. They end their trip close to the Welsh border on the Walcot Estate in a 200-year-old hideaway known as the Wheelwright's shop that once lived 20 miles away but was dismantled and transported piece by piece before being rebuilt to look exactly the same

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp is in the Home Counties with Harvie and Ranjit, who have had one of the longest searches she has ever tried to crack. With a staggering £1.6m budget, it seems like it should be simple but the couple confess to having viewed and rejected nearly 100 properties. Phil Spencer has a challenge of a different sort. Zosia and David have saved hard for their first home and have been living Zosia's parents while they search. They have their hearts set on the popular town of Hitchin and Phil thinks that might be partly why their £380,000 remains unspent

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back at some of their favourite properties from the show. They begin in Cullercoats, on North Tyneside, where Mark and Suze Drummond have emotional ties to their Victorian townhouse - special memories that are making it difficult for Suzie to consider leaving. In Rushden, Northamptonshire, Susan and John Antoniou-Bailey are torn over their unique five-bedroom home. Susan loves its history and original features, but John has had enough of constantly moving between the disjointed, boxy rooms

Can Bruce pull the evening off with style, and will he do enough to grab the cash?

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: At Château Larribau, Paul and Julia enjoy their first week as chateau owners, and are keen to make the huge house feel like a home by renovating one room as a bolthole. At Château de Bourneau, Erin and JB are alarmed to discover that their dormer windows are falling apart, leading to water damage. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Neil Smith and his partner Steph Grzyb regularly take holidays in Fuerteventura in the Canary Islands, where Neil can play golf in guaranteed sunshine. He would love to live there full-time, but Steph would rather settle on the Isle of Wight. Jasmine Harman and Sara Damergi are on hand to offer advice on the pros and cons of either move

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Steve Cross has had a lifelong dream of living abroad and has finally met the love of his life, Sue, to share it with. With help from presenter Sara Damergi, they're determined to relocate to Aude in the south of France

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: In Almería, Sharon Garner and her husband Steve catch up with their former clients, retired nurse Susie and her husband Daryl from Southampton, who bought their 'forever home' in the Spanish sun in 2020. In Alicante, sisters Sophie and Charlotte Rodriguez are reunited with Welsh couple Sara and Mark who, back in 2021, were looking for a place to call home for them and their two cats

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Club owner and millionaire Vernal Aley hosts the first in a week of parties on the Wirral, Merseyside, inviting feminist and student Candida Darling, party girl Chrissy Griffin, chicken enthusiast Adele Richards and project manager Stuart Leake to dinner

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Feminist and student Candida Darling continues the challenge on the Wirral. The views she holds on Vernal Aley's lap-dancing business are questioned when the guests discover a set of revealing pictures, but the night ends in good spirits

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Chicken enthusiast Adele Richards intends to use an abundance of home-grown ingredients, including freshly laid eggs, when she hosts the third party on the Wirral. Unfortunately, her efforts are overshadowed by the amount of cat hair her guests find in the food - a situation Chrissy Griffin finds immensely amusing

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hairdresser Chrissy Griffin hosts the fourth dinner party on the Wirral, Merseyside, hoping to win over her guests with a Caribbean menu and a group of Spanish troubadours. However, tensions soon boil over and one of the party storms out

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Project manager Stuart Leake hosts the final dinner party on the Wirral and hopes to bring harmony to the group with a 1920s-themed event. He also gives a demonstration of his piano playing, before the contestants discover who will be taking home the prize money

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King is in south-west Cyprus helping house-hunter Uri find a permanent home for him and his wife Hazel. The pair, from Aberdeen, are keen to escape the cold Scottish winters anf have a budget of £200,000 to help realise their dreams

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Hugh and Bruce are keen to escape the rat race and are selling up to relocate from Scotland to southern Alicante in Spain. They are looking for a new forever home where they can relax and spend quality time together with their two dogs. Jasmine Harman lines up five great properties for their budget of £135,000, but will the couple love any of them enough to put in an offer?

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout (2018)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and the IMF team join forces with CIA assassin August Walker to prevent a disaster caused by mysterious arms dealer John Lark and a group of terrorists known as the Apostles. However, Hunt and his colleagues are soon pushed to their limits thanks to a face from their past. Writer/director Christopher McQuarrie's sixth entry in the action thriller saga, starring Tom Cruise and Henry Cavill

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Famous faces including Martin and Roman Kemp, Jamie Carragher and Micah Richards, Miquita and Andi Oliver, Mo Gilligan with Babatunde Aléshé, Nick Grimshaw and his niece Liv, Melanie C and her brother Paul, Paul Sinha and his husband Olly, Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont, Fearne Cotton and Gok Wan, Clare Balding and Alice Arnold, and Zoe Ball, Johnny Ball and Woody Cook

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Staff at Queen's Medical Centre in Nottingham treat Kaeden, a 16-year-old battling a serious childhood illness, who has been rushed in after developing a fever at home. His mother describes her son's struggle with acute lymphoblastic leukaemia. Other patients include an aspiring pilot who has come off his motorbike during a track race and a man who has partially amputated his thumb

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts, as Roisin Conaty and Asim Chaudhry take on Jon Richardson and Josh Widdicombe. Bill Bailey is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate

programme.title: Wonders of the World I Can't See
programme.desc: Chris McCausland and Liza Tarbuck head to Canada to experience the majestic natural marvel that is Niagara Falls. It's the only wonder in the series that makes a noise, so Chris is especially excited to be here. The pair explore the wider Canadian cultural landscape of axe throwing, bushcraft and poutine before heading into the heart of the falls for an emotional final experience

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back at two of their biggest builds. In Huddersfield, Paul and Dawn Welham-Campbell's higgledy-piggledy layout simply does not work for them any more. Kirstie gets the sledgehammer out, while Phil searches for properties to rival Paul and Dawn's own. In Woodford, east London, Keeley and Terrence Stamp are also at loggerheads. Keeley's fed up that their family of five is bursting out of their three bedrooms and one bathroom, and that their open plan lounge is basically one big noisy thoroughfare. Which of the property duo will come up with the best solution to their problems?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Councillor Linda Weeks-Holt hosts the first party in Stockport, Greater Manchester, and prepares a rags-to-riches-themed dinner filled with northern delicacies. Despite one guest revealing she knows Prince Charles, Linda reclaims the limelight when she dons a sparkly outfit to entertain her diners on the keyboard

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Annie Targett throws the second party in Stockport, but her insistence on hosting a black-tie event fails to distract the other diners, who begin to search her home for evidence of her allegedly aristocratic lineage

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Civil servant Sam Kitching hosts the third dinner party in Stockport, and intends to put retired policeman John Brinnand in his place while charming the female guests. His Arabian dress code leaves the diners guessing what to wear, and the evening brings out another contestant's competitive spirit

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Kristen Cooley takes on the challenge as she hosts the fourth dinner party in Stockport. She plans to dazzle her guests with an American-themed party, but has to overcome the prejudice of her diners, who think this means cheeseburgers and fast-food will be on the menu

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Retired police officer John Brinnand hosts the final dinner party in Stockport, Greater Manchester, and hopes to impress his guests with a Thai menu. However, his entertainment is not to everyone's taste, and he discovers how he has fared as the winner of the £1,000 is announced

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Ben and Billie embark on an ambitious project to turn their boatshed into an outdoor glamping kitchen. It's no mean feat, with concrete running low and plumbing to work out

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Pete and Kim Smith cannot decide whether to downsize in Warwickshire or buy a holiday home in the Antequera region of Spain with a view to one day moving there permanently

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Mother and daughter Retini and Jess Dunleavy from Berkshire seek help from Sara Damergi in their search for a property that can be used as a retirement and holiday home in the Languedoc region of south-west France. The pair have a budget of £90,000 to secure their dream

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: Documentary following two families who have set up shop in Spain selling properties to fellow Brits looking for a home in the sun

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Head teacher Corinna hosts the first of five parties in and around Essex, hoping her royal-themed evening will impress her guests Paul, Grace, Harmy and Adam

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Forty-seven-year-old money broker Paul hosts the second dinner party in and around Essex, aiming to impress his guests with an evening of fine dining

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Teacher Harmy hosts the third night of the competition in and around Essex, hoping to impress her guests by serving up an authentic Punjabi feast

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Recruitment consultant Adam is the fourth to host in and around Essex, and hopes to exceed expectations with a menu of posh nosh at his dad's house

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The last to act as host is 24-year-old recruitment consultant Grace, who hopes to dazzle her guests with a glamorous party, Essex-style. With a menu full of home-made grub and help from her family along the way, it remains to be seen whether Grace has done enough to bag the £1,000

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Shane and Sharon dream of owning a holiday home on the Costa del Sol that they can escape to during the winter to enjoy the area's all-year round outdoor lifestyle. With a budget of £135,000, they want an apartment or town house close to the beach around La Cala de Mijas, with two bedrooms so their family can come to visit. Danni Menzies rises to the challenge to find them the perfect property

programme.title: Britain's Most Luxurious Train Journeys
programme.desc: On the Statesman train, travelling to Snowdonia in north Wales, a retired train driver is surprised with a heritage steam railway ride from the historic mining town of Blaenau Ffestiniog. Luxury train regulars Gary and Kim celebrate their first wedding anniversary with a return trip back to where they spent their first holiday together

programme.title: Exploring India's Treasures with Bettany Hughes
programme.desc: Part one of two. A journey through the greatest archaeological, architectural and cultural treasures of the Indian subcontinent, starting in the holy city of Varanasi. Bettany is invited to take part in a ceremony to honour her recently departed mother. Embedding herself further into the spiritual worlds of India, Bettany heads to New Delhi to experience celebrations of Sufism and uncover the story of one of India's greatest rulers, Akbar the Great

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Jonathan Broom and his wife Deborah have put everything on hold while he pursues his dream of building a miniature Hollywood Hills-style mansion. They stumble across a scrap of land in north London, but it's fraught with problems and the only way they can complete the £1million home is by sinking half of it six metres below ground. Surrounded on all sides by their neighbours' back gardens, the couple have to dismantle walls and fences and promise to put them back together again, and that's just the start of their difficulties. Kevin McCloud follows their progress

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E

programme.desc: Sotheby's managing director Guy hopes to secure the listing of a £6.5million 14-bedroom, five-acre Grade II listed manor house mega home onto his books. Aston Tirrold in Oxfordshire boasts six reception rooms, a tennis court and a huge outdoor pool, and has been home to the same family since 1975. Broker Kenrick heads to Camden, north London, to try to secure the listing of an uber-modern glass building apartment with three bedrooms, three bathrooms and a 900-square-ft roof terrace

programme.desc: Officers close in on a suspected stolen car near Tadcaster, but they have to deploy two stingers as the driver tries to escape by hitting speeds in excess of 100mph. programme.desc: A landlord seeks urgent advice from eviction specialist Chris after finding his three-bedroom terrace has been stripped bare of the fittings, the flooring, and even the grass on the lawn. Plus, Selina and Lee must return from America for a court case to recover £10,000 rent arrears on their UK property

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Kate faces trouble from unruly tenants, who became anti-social, and are now trying to sue her for serving them an eviction notice. programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Claire and Simon seek eviction specialist Chris's help to evict a man claiming to be renting their old family home. Plus, a man is almost £30,000 in debt and in danger of repossession after his tenants stopped paying the rent

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Cases include Wendy, who was left with rental arrears of almost £3,000 after renting a house out to a nightmare tenant. Steve from Birmingham Council's housing enforcement team investigates poor living conditions above a local shop. And in south London, lawyer Chris has to deal with his client's site which has been filled by nearly two dozen caravans and a mountain of rubbish

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Alex is hit with a £7,000 bill after his tenant is found to have been running a business from his property. programme.desc: Steve is involved in a dangerous high-speed pursuit of a car stolen in a burglary. Claire and Tom deal with an abusive drunk driver who is clueless about what he has done wrong, rookie Omar tackles a fence-hopping suspect whose antics have left him with a slashed hand, and Steve tracks down a car suspected of being involved in a robbery

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Charlie and Wayne are in hot pursuit of a van, but the driver crashes the vehicle and runs off into the night. programme.desc: A high-powered Porsche is pursued by eight police cars and a helicopter, while Officers Ben P and Ben B attend a crash scene where a car has flipped over and landed on its roof, and their difficult job is made harder by a crowd filming the aftermath of the accident on their phones

programme.title: Tomb Raider (2018)
programme.desc: After her father's disappearance, kickboxing heiress Lara Croft makes money as a bike courier and refuses to claim her inheritance, convinced her dad is still alive. But when she learns the country estate could be sold off unless she claims it, she reluctantly agrees - and finds a pre-recorded message from her father giving clues to his possible whereabouts. Determined to find him, she sets out across the sea to Hong Kong - but soon crosses paths with a small army of mercenaries determined to break into a supposedly haunted tomb.
